items.title: Implement Analytics Dashboard
items.description: Develop an analytics dashboard within the project management tool to display key project metrics and performance indicators.
acceptance_criteria: Dashboard displays at least 5 key metrics such as project progress, task completion rate, resource utilization, budget usage, and deadline adherence.
Data on the dashboard updates in real-time or within 5 minutes of changes in the system.
Users can filter metrics by project, team, and date range.
Dashboard is accessible from the main navigation menu.
Charts and graphs are interactive and allow drill-down into detailed data.
dependencies: Data collection and storage mechanisms for project metrics
non_functional: Dashboard loads within 3 seconds under normal load
Supports responsive design for desktop and tablet devices
Ensures data accuracy with less than 1% error rate

notes: Assumed that the analytics dashboard is a new feature within an existing project management tool. Specific metrics and update frequency were inferred due to lack of detail.
